name: *NEW IMPROVED COLOUR* Mezaya 'FRENCH NUDE' Water Based Nail Polish
description: For ingredients and essential product information click here French Nude - Translucent A sheer nude pink, with a gentle shimmer. Clear with a hit of pink for pure understated elegance. This is the perfect polish to use daily, helping to keep nails looking clean, glossy and healthy. Looks bright pink in the bottle, 1 coat dries sheer, 2 coats adds more pigment. Picture shows multiple coats in order for colour tint to show up clearly on camera. 10ml Clean nails with MEZAYA REMOVER before polishing, any oils including creams, soaps and even natural skin oils will interfere with the adherence of water based nail polish. Apply 2 - 4 thin coats of polish, making sure each coat is dry before reapplying (drying time can be affected by humidity and temperature). Apply 2 coats of TOPCOAT, this is an ESSENTIAL step to seal and protect the polish. MEZAYA nail polishes dry to the touch in 2- 3 mins and 'to use' allow 20 mins. The polish will reach ultimate hardness in 3- 4 hours. Remove polish weekly. TIPS: Avoid contact with hot water and harsh detergents for 4 hours after application - Polishing nails before bedtime is ideal, as it allows uninterupted drying time. Remove polish weekly with MEZAYA biodegradable Remover - the polish may become harder to remover if left for extended periods of time, especially on very dry or porous nails. If polish thickens with time, add a drop of water, shake and stirr thoroughly, repeat until ideal consistency has returned. The thickening accurs as the water may gradually evaporate from the formula. MEZAYA water-based nail colours are an innovative concept to traditional polish. If you are used to traditional polishes you will immediately notice some differences. MEZAYA polishes do not have the potent smell usually associated with nail polish. Conventional nail polish contains large amount (typically around 60- 70%) of chemical solvents such as toluene, acetates and alcohol. These solvents have odours that can be offensive to adults, children and even to animals MEZAYA colors are formulated using water as the main base ingredient, not harsh solvents. This makes us different from all mainstream nail polish brands, including those that advertise themselves as (so called) 'chemical free', '3 free' (DPB/Formaldehyde/Toulene), 'eco - friendly' or 'natural'. Please note, If a nail polish is to work on human nails, it can not be 100% 'natural'. If you enjoy wearing nail polish, and want to keep them as 'free from' as possible, MEZAYA is one of the most gentle, water-based polishes available on the market today.

name: Mezaya 'DOUBLE ESPRESSO' Water-Based Nail Polish
description: For ingredients and essential product information click here Double Espresso - Cream The darkest, most decadent bitter chocolate black. Very dark and very delicious. A must have winter shade. 10ml Clean nails with MEZAYA REMOVER before polishing, any oils including creams, soaps and even natural skin oils will interfere with the adherence of water based nail polish. Apply 2 - 4 thin coats of polish, making sure each coat is dry before reapplying (drying time can be affected by humidity and temperature). Apply 2 coats of TOPCOAT, this is ESSENTIAL step to seal and protect the polish. MEZAYA nail polishes dry to the touch in 2- 3 mins and 'to use' allow 20 mins. The polish will reach ultimate hardness in 3- 4 hours. Remove polish weekly. TIPS: Avoid contact with hot water and harsh detergents for 4 hours after application - Polishing nails before bedtime is ideal, as it allows uninterupted drying time. Remove polish weekly with MEZAYA biodegradable Remover - the polish may become harder to remover if left for extended periods of time, especially on very dry or porous nails. If polish thickens with time, add a drop of water, shake and stirr thoroughly, repeat until ideal consistency has returned. The thickening accurs as the water may gradually evaporate from the formula. MEZAYA water-based nail colours are an innovative concept to traditional polish. If you are used to traditional polishes you will immediately notice some differences. MEZAYA polishes do not have the potent smell usually associated with nail polish. Conventional nail polish contains large amount (typically around 60- 70%) of chemical solvents such as toluene, acetates and alcohol. These solvents have odours that can be offensive to adults, children and even to animals MEZAYA colors are formulated using water as the main base ingredient, not harsh solvents. This makes us different from all mainstream nail polish brands, including those that advertise themselves as (so called) 'chemical free', '3 free' (DPB/Formaldehyde/Toulene), 'eco - friendly' or 'natural'. Please note, If a nail polish is to work on human nails, it can not be 100% 'natural'. If you enjoy wearing nail polish, and want to keep them as 'free from' as possible, MEZAYA is one of the most gentle, water-based polishes available on the market today.

description: For ingredients and essential product information click here Liquid Leather- Cream As black as a moonless night. name: Mezaya 'ICE WHITE' Water-Based Nail Polish
description: For ingredients and essential product information click here Ice White - Cream Pure snow white. Ideal for use on French manicures. If using this colour on the whole nail, very precise application is required with this polish to help prevent streaks. 10ml Clean nails with MEZAYA REMOVER before polishing, any oils including creams, soaps and even natural skin oils will interfere with the adherence of water based nail polish. Apply 2 - 4 thin coats of polish, making sure each coat is dry before reapplying (drying time can be affected by humidity and temperature). name: *NEW IMPROVED FORMULA* Mezaya Essential base/ Topcoat Sealer
description: For ingredients and essential product information click here *New Improved Formula* Base/ Top Coat Sealer - translucent An absolute must for prolonging the life of your manicure/ pedicure. Creates a base and seals the Mezaya polishes, adding protection and shine. After cleaning nails with Mezaya Remover, this sealer can be applied as a base coat before painting on your colour. Apply 2 coats of TOPCOAT on top of your polish colour, this is an ESSENTIAL step to seal and protect the polish. Ingredients: Acrylic acid/acrylate copolymer, 1,2-Propanediol, Etanol. 10ml

name: Mezaya Biodegradable Nail Polish Remover
description: For ingredients and essential product information click here Mezaya Nail Polish Remover Naturally derived from soya and corn farm crops. Mezaya Remover is readily biodegradable, and does not contain any petroleum ingredients. This is an excellent alterternative to conventional Removers and works on most other nail polish brands. Non GMO Non toxic Moisturising to nails Biodegradable Non-flammable Free from petroleum ingredients. Suitable for solvent based nail polishes. It is important that our remover is used prior to the application of the water based polish. This is because any traces of chemical based polishes, any hand oils, body creams or traces of soap products, that may have been used prior to polishing are removed. The water based polish will not adhere to the nail if there is any trace of oil even natural oils. Remove Mezaya polish weekly. 30ml

name: Travel Size Glass Nail File
description: Glass Nail File These brilliant nail files never blunt; simply wash in warm ,soapy water to keep clean. They are ultra smooth and file nails without splitting or rasping. They can also be used to smooth ridges on thickened nails incredibly quickly. At the perfect handbag size of 9cm, they are easy to travel with, keep at home or use on the go. ''Yay the glass nail arrived today and WOW! It is absolutely gorgeous and I've never had anything like it.''

name: Mezaya BESPOKE STARTER BOX
description: Mezaya Starter Set The perfect starter kit or gift for anyone new to Mezaya water-based polishes and Biodegradable Remover. Simply select the Nail Polish Colour you would like in the set from the drop down menu below. Your set will include: 1 x Mezaya Nail Polish (your colour choice) 1 x Mezaya Essential Top Coat 1 x Mezaya Biodegradable Remover 1 x Travel size Glass Nail File Elegantly presented in a pretty eco chic recycled gift box with bow. Application instuctions included. ''My set arrived today and is gorgeous - and I sat in the garden painting my nails. As its odourless my dog kept coming over to investigate! .....Really pleased with the gift set and beautifully packaged.'' A.T

name: *NEW* 'MERMAID HAIR' MEZAYA GIRL* 'PEEL OFF' NAIL PAINT*
description: 'MERMAID HAIR' - A bright tangerine red! A fun, safe, PEEL OFF water-based and non toxic nail paint, for kids who want nails like Mummy! Suitable for children 3 years+ under adult supervision. Especially designed for children and young fashionistas, these nail paints are short wearing (lasts a day) and non toxic. They are free from solvents and there is no need for Remover, as they peel off! These Nail Paints are one of the most gentle and 'free from' on the market today and are odour and fume-free. Apply 2 to 3 coats to clean and grease-free nail. (If you have MEZAYA Remover, use this to clean nails to make sure nails are totally greese free). Mezaya products are not tested on animals. Ingredients: Aqua, polyurethane, acrylic copolymer, mica (C.I. 77019), titanium dioxide (C.I. 77891), carmine (C.I. 75470). 6ml

categories.name: MEZAYA WATER BASED NAIL POLISH - Kids *PEEL OFF* Nail Paints

name: Clear
description:
Clear - translucent

Try mixing crushed eye shadows to this polish base, to create your own nail polish tint.

Seal and fix the colour with MEZAYA TOPCOAT SEALER. 

15ml 

Please note, this range has a different formula to our more advanced, improved MEZAYA products formula.

The range will be discontinued.

 
1. Clean nail with remover, oils will interfere with the adhesion of the polish.
2. Apply 2 coats of polish and then MEZAYA topcoat to seal. Make sure polish is dry between coats.
3. For best results apply this range at night so the polish has a chance to 'cure' and fully harden uninterupted. Keep hands out of hot water for the first couple of hours.


Ingredients: Water, water-miscible acrylic and polyurethane film formers and thickeners, glycol ethers. May contain mica, D&C red lake, ultramarine blue and chromium, iron and titanium oxide pigments.

name: Star fire
description:
Star fire- translucent

A clear polish with real sprinklings of multi-coloured glitter. This is an easy polish to wear.  

Seal and fix the polish with MEZAYA TOPCOAT Sealer.

6.00 15ml 

15ml 

Please note, this range has a different formula to our more advanced, improved MEZAYA products formula.

The range will be discontinued.

 
1. Clean nail with remover, oils will interfere with the adhesion of the polish.
2. Apply 2 coats of polish and then the topcoat to seal. Make sure polish is dry between coats.
3. For best results apply this range at night so the polish has a chance to 'cure' and fully harden uninterupted. Keep hands out of hot water for the first couple of hours.


Ingredients: Water, water-miscible acrylic and polyurethane film formers and thickeners, glycol ethers. May contain mica, D&C red lake, ultramarine blue and chromium, iron and titanium oxide pigments.

name: Remover
description:
Remover
Non-toxic, safe to use, and contains none of the solvents that could offend your nose or harm our atmosphere. Aloe Vera and Vitamin E are added to supplement the natural oils that protect your nails and cuticles. Works on all water based nail polishes.

Please note: This Remover has a different formula to the Mezaya Remover and may not be as effective on Mezaya polishes. 
 
 112ml

name: ORGANICALLY TANNED BABY SHEEPSKIN RUG
description:
Reduced from 125 - NOW 85! 

These are very special.
These sheepskin baby rugs are British bred and come from the only registered organic sheepskin tannery in the British Isles. 

It has been found a baby with a baby rug settles in most places, because they will relate to their rug not their surroundings. 

The skins are tanned using a unique organically certified Biodynamic, chemical-free process (Demeter certificate 323, Defra UK6 and also complies with SA standards). 
They are tanned with pure Mimosa extract from plantation grown trees in South Africa, grown specifically for the purpose and no part of the tree is wasted. 
Only tannin from vegetable origin is environmentally friendly, nothing else is biodegradable. Mimosa gives a warm, soft, machine washable skin, with the fleece, fibre or hair as nature intended, minus the dirt and debris, which is friendly to people, babies and other animals.
The tannery also have their own reed bed which cleans the grey water and supports its own eco system.

    *  Machine washable
    *  Last for years
    *  Non allergenic
    *  No bleaches
    *  No dyes
    *  No toxic chemicals either in the raw materials or the process

These Sheepskins, suitable for those with the delicate skin of the newborn, the elderly and the bed ridden and are naturally in very, very short supply. They are very special. 
The raw materials are only available for a matter of weeks in any one year. The fleece must be very soft and/or silky and just the right length and density. A very tight remit. 


ORGANIC SHEEPSKINS are completely different to all others. No others comply with the very strict rules governing these laid down by an independent certification body. 
Beware cheap substitutes; it has been thought that chemical residues may relate to cot death.

A wonderful, unique and useful baby gift. 

Approx. size 36  38 (91.5cm  96.5cm)

name: Nourishing Shea & Cocoa Butter Lip Balm
description: Lovely Lip Balm For kissably soft and supple lips, try our lovely soothing lip balm. 100% natural and nourishing. No added perfume - the only smell is the soft aroma of the naturally chocolatety organic cocoa butter. This formula is moisturing and has a sweet, decadent, 'creamy' texture which stays put on lips. A little goes a longway. It is wonderful for softening, healing and protecting chapped skin. An essential product for every season. Ingredients: Organic, Unrefined, Fairtrade Shea Butter; Cold pressed Sweet Almond Oil, Organic Yellow unbleached Beeswax; Organic, Unrefined, Fairtrade Cocoa Butter. Comes in a cute, fully recyclable, little cardboard pot. 5g Handmade in the UK ''Already addicted to your lipbalm..it's lush!'' Michaela, Cornwall. ''Lip balm- I adore it! ..I want your whole collection!'' Leigh, London

name: Raw Cocoa & Orange Heavenly Bath melt
description:
Cocoa & Orange Heavenly Bath melt

This luxurious bath melt is simply divine! The raw cocoa butter with Orange essential oil and Vanilla smells decadently delicous! Break off a chunk of this scrumptious chocolate-like bar, and drop under the hot running water of your bath. This melt can also be used in the shower as an intense moisturiser; rub bar onto skin, it will melt away leaving you beautifully soft. 

Ingredients: raw & organic cocoa butter, sodium bicarbonate and essential oils of vanilla and orange


Directions: Simply break off a chunk, and add to warm running bath water. Alternatively rub onto skin in the shower as an intense moisturiser.

Warning: The bath may be slippery after use.

100% compostable packaging.
Handmade in the UK
80g

name: Natural Deodorant Stone
description:
Our Natural Deodorant Stones are made out of crystallized alum salts taken from natural mineral springs and grown over several months. The stones are then cut and shaped. 

Free from harsh chemicals, perfumes, oils, emulsifiers or alcohol. NO aluminium chlorohydrate or parabens. 

The stone works by leaving a fine layer of natural mineral salts on the skin, which is not absorbed into the body; (Potassium Alum molecules have a negative ionic charge, making it unable to pass through cell walls) this prevent the growth of bacteria which are the primary cause of odour. 

These deodorants are safe to use and will not cause high levels of alumium in your system. ('Alum' and 'Aluminium are two different substances, with distinct chemical signatures.)

Each stone is presented in a lovely little basket; stone shapes may slightly vary. Hand cut in Thailand. 

Directions: Apply to wet skin, staight after a shower or bath, or Wet and moisten the stone and rub generously onto the areas that need protection. 
After use place on a dry surface to air dry. 

Aprox 100g

name: Lavender & Ylang Ylang Bath Salts
description:
Lavender & Ylang Ylang Bath Salts

The relaxing combination of fragrant Lavender and exotic Ylang Ylang essential oils may help to calm and soothe the body and mind. This mix has a wonderfully balancing and stimulating effect- Ylang Ylang is known to assist with physical exhaustion, stress, and it's aphrodisiac efffect. Lavender oil has many benifical properties including calming and relieving tension. The dead sea salt is packed with nourishing, rich minerals; the sodium bicarbonate will help soften water, while goat milk may help rejuvinate and soften dry skin.

Ingredients: Maris Sel (dead sea salt) , sodium bicarbonate, goat milk, lavendula angustifolia, (lavender essential oil) cananga odorata (ylang ylang essential oil).


Directions: Add a generous, big spoonful to hot running water - relax and enjoy!

Handmade in the UK

100g

name: Glowing Skin PEPPERMINT Sugar Scrub
description:
Peppermint Sugar Scrub

Gently rub into your skin whilst bathing and rinse to reveal soft, glowing skin. Pat dry to remain moisturised and gorgeous smelling all day long! A favourite of Kimberly from the Pussycat Dolls.

Suitable for Vegetarians & Vegans.

Ingredients:

   prunus amygdalus (sweet almond oil)
   sugar (Vegan Society approved Sugar)
   mentha arvensis (peppermint essential oil)

name: Glowing Skin MANDARIN Sugar Scrub
description:
Mandarin Sugar Scrub 


Gently rub into your skin whilst bathing and rinse to reveal soft, glowing skin. Pat dry to remain moisturised and gorgeous smelling all day long! A favourite of Kimberly from the Pussycat Dolls.

Suitable for Vegetarians & Vegans.
120g
Ingredients:

     prunus amygdalus (sweet almond oil)
     sugar (Vegan Society approved sugar)
     citrus aurantifolias (mandarin essential oil)

name: Blissful Baby Box
description: Brilliant natural products for TOTAL BLISS as you enjoy your new baby. Bring the benefits of nurture, nourishing skin care, relaxation and positive touch into your family life. If your baby is happy then you will be happy too. Box Includes: Baby Top to Toe Wash (100ml) Bath time can quickly become an important and fun part of your baby's bedtime routine; soothing, gentle and kind, this all over wash contains gentle LAVENDER WATER, CALENDULA and ALOE VERA and can be used to wash your baby's hair and body, before a lovely massage after bath and before sleep. Ingredients: *Lavender hydrolat (not essential oil), Calendula flower, Bentaine Decyl glycoside, glycerol, (natural foaming agents) Aloe Vera, Citric acid, Xanthum gum.*denotes ORGANIC ingredients. Baby Massage Oil (50ml) The perfect pure massage oil for baby massage; massage is a wonderful way for mothers and fathers to connect and bond and help build the warmth of their relationship with their new baby. SUNFLOWER oil is the perfect match for your baby's skin. Ideal after bath time. Ingredients: *Sunflower oil, Vitamin E. *denotes 99.9% Organic ingredients. Baby Bottom Butter (15ml) A healing and soothing butter which melts on contact with skin; wonderfully soothing, softening and healing for little bottoms with SHEA BUTTER, CALENDULA, VITAMIN E and healing and soothing essential oils of TEA TREE, ROMAN CHAMOMILE and LAVENDER. Ingredients: *Shea butter, * Calendula oil, Vitamin E. Essential oils of *Lavender, *Roman Chamomile, *Tea Tree. *denotes 99.9% Organic ingredients. Baby Special Skin Balm (15ml) A universal soother for any dry skin, cradle cap and even mum's sore nipples ; no essential oils so suitable for breastfeeding mums. Ingredients: *Shea butter, *Calendula flower, *Extra virgin olive oil, vitamin E. *denotes 99.9% Organic ingredients. Organic Ultra soft Cotton Flannel An ultra soft organic cotton flannel ideal for skincare and bath time. Step By Step Baby Massage Guide A full colour Step by Step Guide to Baby Massage, written by Katie Whitehouse, an experienced Massage Therapist and Baby Massage Instructor and founder of Vital Touch. The photographs and tips in the booklet make massaging your baby fun and easy.
